column4: I've just installed compiz-fusion. Everything works fine, but i have only 2 Desktops. So i have no cube, just a 'page' with two sides. Where can i set the number of desktops?
Right Click and choose Settings at the bottom right panel of your desktop
Does anyone know a good 1:1 Mac OS X like Desktop "CD Case Viewer" of current playing Song? :o
I have done so, but only the 'page' with 2 sides
